verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> of the things which we have <S%G3004>spoken<s%> this is the <S%G2774>sum:<s%> We <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> an <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priest,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> is <S%G2523>set<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> the <S%G1188>right<s%> hand of the <S%G2362>throne<s%> of the <S%G3172>Majesty<s%> in the <S%G3772>heavens;<s%>
A <S%G3011>minister<s%> of the <S%G39>sanctuary,<s%> and of the <S%G228>true<s%> <S%G4633>tabernacle,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G4078>pitched,<s%> and not <S%G444>man.<s%>

For <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priest<s%> is <S%G2525>ordained<s%> to <S%G4374>offer<s%> <S%G1435>gifts<s%> and <S%G2378>sacrifices:<s%> <S%G3606>why<s%> it is of <S%G316>necessity<s%> that <S%G5126>this<s%> man <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5100>somewhat<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> to <S%G4374>offer.<s%>

For <S%G1487>if<s%> he were <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G1093>earth,<s%> he should not be a <S%G2409>priest,<s%> seeing that there are <S%G2409>priests<s%> that <S%G4374>offer<s%> <S%G1435>gifts<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G3551>law:<s%>

<S%G3748>Who<s%> <S%G3000>serve<s%> to the <S%G5262>example<s%> and <S%G4639>shadow<s%> of <S%G2032>heavenly<s%> things, as <S%G3475>Moses<s%> was <S%G5537>admonished<s%> of <S%G5537>God<s%> when he was <S%G3195>about<s%> to <S%G2005>make<s%> the <S%G4633>tabernacle:<s%> for, <S%G3708>See,<s%> <S%G5346>said<s%> he, that you <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> things <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G5179>pattern<s%> <S%G1166>showed<s%> to you in the <S%G3735>mount.<s%>

But <S%G3570>now<s%> has he <S%G5177>obtained<s%> a more <S%G1313>excellent<s%> <S%G3009>ministry,<s%> by <S%G3745>how<s%> <S%G3745>much<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> he is the <S%G3316>mediator<s%> of a <S%G2909>better<s%> <S%G1242>covenant,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> was <S%G3549>established<s%> on <S%G2909>better<s%> <S%G1860>promises.<s%>

For <S%G1487>if<s%> that <S%G4413>first<s%> covenant had <S%G2258>been<s%> <S%G273>faultless,<s%> then should <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G5117>place<s%> have been <S%G2212>sought<s%> for the <S%G1208>second.<s%>

For finding <S%G3201>fault<s%> with them, he <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G2400>Behold,<s%> the <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G2064>come,<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> when I will <S%G4931>make<s%> a <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G1242>covenant<s%> with the <S%G3624>house<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel<s%> and with the <S%G3624>house<s%> of <S%G2455>Judah:<s%>

Not <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G1242>covenant<s%> that I <S%G4160>made<s%> with their <S%G3962>fathers<s%> in the <S%G2250>day<s%> when I <S%G1949>took<s%> them by the <S%G5495>hand<s%> to <S%G1806>lead<s%> them out of the <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G125>Egypt;<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> they <S%G1696>continued<s%> not in my <S%G1242>covenant,<s%> and I <S%G272>regarded<s%> them not, <S%G3004>said<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

For <S%G3778>this<s%> is the <S%G1242>covenant<s%> that I will <S%G1303>make<s%> with the <S%G3624>house<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G2250>days,<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord;<s%> I will <S%G1325>put<s%> my <S%G3551>laws<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> their <S%G1271>mind,<s%> and <S%G1924>write<s%> them in their <S%G2588>hearts:<s%> and I will be to them a <S%G2316>God,<s%> and they shall be to me a <S%G2992>people:<s%>

And they shall not <S%G1321>teach<s%> <S%G1538>every<s%> man his <S%G4139>neighbor,<s%> and <S%G1538>every<s%> man his <S%G80>brother,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1097>Know<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord:<s%> for <S%G3956>all<s%> shall <S%G1492>know<s%> me, from the <S%G3398>least<s%> to the <S%G3173>greatest.<s%>
For I will be <S%G2436>merciful<s%> to their <S%G93>unrighteousness,<s%> and their <S%G266>sins<s%> and their <S%G458>iniquities<s%> will I <S%G3415>remember<s%> <S%G3364>no<s%> <S%G2089>more.<s%>

In that he <S%G3004>said,<s%> A <S%G2537>new<s%> covenant, he has <S%G3822>made<s%> the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G3822>old.<s%> <S%G1161>Now<s%> that which <S%G3822>decays<s%> and <S%G1095>waxes<s%> <S%G1095>old<s%> is <S%G1451>ready<s%> to <S%G854>vanish<s%> away.
